Majida Khattari (amụrụ n'afọ 1966) bụ onye Morocco amụrụ na France na-ese ihe n'oge a. Ọrụ ya na-ekwukarị banyere ejiji na ahụ ụmụ nwanyị na Islam nke oge a. A maara ya maka ihe ngosi ejiji ya, nke jikọtara ihe ngosi ejiji nke ọdịda anyanwụ na uwe na omenala ndị Alakụba.

A mụrụ Majida Khattari na 1966 na Erfoud, Morocco. Ọ gara School of Fine Arts of Casablanca (1988 diploma), na site na 1988 ọ kwagara Paris ịga Beaux-Arts de Paris (English: National School of Fine Arts of Paris; 1995 national higher diploma in plastic arts).

N'oge na-adịghị anya mgbe ọ bịarutere Paris, na Septemba 1989 esemokwu nke Islam scarf na France na-eme, mgbe a kwụsịrị ụmụ akwụkwọ nwanyị atọ maka ịjụ iwepu scarves ha na klas na ụlọ akwụkwọ etiti na Creil, ghọrọ akụkọ mba ụwa. Arụmụka a emeela ka ihe osise ya nweta mkpali.

A na-emepụta nka Khattari n'ọtụtụ mgbasa ozi dị iche iche, nke gụnyere foto, nka arụmọrụ, ihe ọkpụkpụ, nka vidiyo, nka ntinye, yana ndị ọzọ. E gosipụtara ọrụ ya na mba ụwa gụnyere na Québec, Canada; Montreal, Canada (2015); London, England; Paris, France; na New York City, New York, United States.
